Artifactor.NAME: The Forger's Studio
DESCRIPTIONS: You wander upon a #y~strange~ #y~building.~ Inside, what seems to be a collection of famous #bcurios, #prelics, and #rbaubles adorn the tables haphazardly. At the back, you see a small counter and on it lies a #ykat. Beside it are four labelled boxes and the sign #g@'Take@ #g@One'.@
Reaching into the box, you feel #runcomfortable, #r@unspeakable@ sensations. Latching onto to something solid, your hand emerges clutching a #grelic gingerly.
You walk slowly towards the exit, the #ykat peering at you beneath hooded #reyes with a small smirk of its own.
OPTIONS: [Bottle] #gObtain #ga #gRelic, #rone #rless #renergy on the first turn of combat.

Replicator.NAME: Counterfeiting
DESCRIPTIONS: You come across a familiar #ykat perched by the side of the room. It's studying a group of #yrelic #ypaintings intently. There are spots for #gtwo #gmore #gpaintings lying empty in the dust.
The #ykat stretches, gives you a glance, and saunters away. As you look down, you notice that only the two of yours remain, but they #garen't #gthe #gsame as when you placed them seconds ago.
You don't trust a #ykat, and you never will. Let them #r@stare@ all they like.

Relicator.NAME: Relicator
DESCRIPTIONS: A smug looking #ykat sits atop a #gpile #gof #grelics. You have never seen two #grelics alike, but here there are dozens and dozens that could be twins. It ~gazes~ at you, as if in invitation.
Walking away with your offering, it returns a short time later, and deposits a #grelic in your outstretched hand. It #rbites #ryour #r@finger@ painfully as you pull the hand away.
Your policy has always been to not pick fights with creatures #rmore #rpowerful than you, and this one seems content to let you #gpass.
OPTIONS: [Craft] Choose a #yreplica, lose it, and gain that #grelic. #rCurse #r- #rPain.
